entry.title: Hola World Again
entry.content:
Has been a while since I last wrote, had embarked on many a journeys along the way. The world has been taken over by ChatGPT-4 / Midjourney / Hugging Face, AI / ML has maken much mainstream attention. We are starting to use them for every possible use case and there is a new economy being create right now, and the early movers have a clear advantage as usual so jump in, create something, playaround, have fun building.

PS: this is a note from my past self :D
